lyrics_abstract:
[chorus: Miss Jones]
I wanna chill
On sugar hill
AZ's for real
he's for real

At times I went to watch out the Marriot
Zoning on owning co-ops, foreign drop-top, coups and yachts
Guzzling straight shots-a scotch,
Formulating up plots ta escape from Salems lock cuz it's scorching hot
Making it hard trying ta figure w[...]
